attributes.action: UK should act to prosecute Benjamin Netanyahu for war crimes
attributes.additional_details:
Whilst Israel is entitled to reasonable self-defence, its attacks on Palestinian civilians in Gaza and in particular those against UN-protected sanctuaries are indiscriminate and a form of genocide. They are a crime against humanity sanctioned by Benjamin Netanyahu.

We ask that our Foreign & Commonwealth Office act through our ambassador to the UN to seek charges against Benjamin Netanyahu for these war crimes at the International Criminal Court (ICC) in the Hague with the support of other nations.
